TextView.android:text: culinary resources
Conventional Oven

Conventional ovens heat food from the bottom and top, using either gas or electric elements. They are the most common type of oven and are good for a variety of cooking tasks, including baking, roasting, and broiling.
Regular Oven
Regular ovens have a fan that circulates hot air throughout the oven, which helps to cook food more evenly and quickly. They are good for roasting meats, vegetables, and poultry.
Microwave Oven
Microwave ovens use microwaves to heat food. They are good for reheating leftovers, cooking frozen meals, and cooking popcorn.
Dutch oven
A Dutch oven is a heavy pot with a tight-fitting lid. It is typically made of cast iron or enameled cast iron. Dutch ovens can be used on the stovetop, in the oven, and even over an open fire.

A stovetop, also known as a cooktop, is a kitchen appliance with one or more burners that heat up cookware. Stovetops are used to cook food by boiling, frying, or simmering. They can be either gas-powered or electric-powered.
clay oven

A clay oven is a traditional type of oven made from clay. It is often used for cooking bread, pizza, and other baked goods. Clay ovens are known for their ability to retain heat, which results in evenly cooked food with a delicious flavor.
bamboo steamer

A bamboo steamer is a traditional Asian cooking vessel made from woven bamboo. It is used to steam food, which is a healthy cooking method that retains nutrients and flavors. Bamboo steamers are typically round and have two or three tiers, which allows you to cook multiple dishes at once.
mortar and pestle
A mortar and pestle is a kitchen tool used to grind, crush, or mix solid food ingredients. The mortar is a bowl-shaped container, and the pestle is a long, heavy stick.
Bamboo skewers
Bamboo skewers are long, thin rods made from bamboo. They are used to cook food, such as kabobs, by holding the food in place while it is grilled or roasted.
Rice cooker
Rice cookers are small, automated appliances that cook rice perfectly every time. They use a heat source, a cooking bowl, and a thermostat to cook rice to perfection.
pressure cooker
A pressure cooker is a pot with a tight-fitting lid that traps steam, which raises the boiling point of water and cooks food faster.
Crock Pot
A Crock-Pot is an electric slow cooker that cooks food at a low temperature for a long period of time. This allows you to set it and forget it, which is perfect for busy people.
rice strainer
A rice strainer is a kitchen utensil with a fine mesh that is used to wash and drain rice. It is typically made of stainless steel or plastic and has a long handle for easy pouring.
Clay pot

Clay pots are a type of cookware made from unglazed clay. They are often used for cooking stews, soups, and other dishes that benefit from slow, even heat. Clay pots can also be used for baking bread and other baked goods.
Sauté pan / Saucepan

Sauté pan: A sauté pan is a versatile kitchen essential with a wide, flat bottom and straight sides.\n\nSaucepan: A saucepan is a small, round pot with a long handle. It is used to cook liquids and small amounts of food.
Roasting pans

Roasting pans are large, oven-safe dishes with a rack. They're used to cook large cuts of meat, poultry, and vegetables. The rack keeps the food from sitting in its own juices, so it cooks evenly and develops a crispy crust.
wok / frying pan

Wok: A deep, round-bottomed pan with sloping sides. It is ideal for stir-frying because it distributes heat evenly and allows for quick cooking.\n\nFrying pan: A flat-bottomed pan with sloping sides. It is ideal for frying, searing, and sauteing.
springform pan

A springform pan is a type of baking pan with a removable bottom and sides. It is typically made of metal or silicone. Springform pans are used to bake cakes, cheesecakes, and other desserts that need to be unmolded without breaking.
Griddle is a flat cooking surface that is heated from below. It is ideal for cooking pancakes, waffles, and other flatbreads and also used to cook eggs, bacon, and other breakfast foods.
barbecue grill

A barbecue grill is a cooking device that uses heat from below to cook food. It can be fueled by gas, charcoal, or electricity. Barbecue grills are used to cook a variety of foods, including meat, poultry, seafood, and vegetables.
smoker grill

A smoker grill is a type of barbecue grill that uses indirect heat and smoke to cook food. Smoker grills are typically made of metal and have a chamber where wood chips or pellets are burned to create smoke.
George Foreman Grill

The George Foreman Grill is a small, electric grill that cooks food evenly on both sides. The grill has a clamshell design that allows food to be cooked without flipping. It also has a non-stick surface that makes cleanup easy. The George Foreman Grill is a popular choice for people who want to cook healthy meals at home.
Parchment paper
Parchment paper baking sheet is a pre-cut, non-stick, and heat-resistant sheet of paper that can be used to bake food. It prevents food from sticking to the pan and makes cleanup easy.
Aluminum foil paper

Aluminum foil paper is a thin, flexible sheet of aluminum metal that is commonly used in cooking and food storage. It is non-stick, moisture-resistant, and heat-conductive, making it a versatile and convenient kitchen tool.
Baking sheet
Baking sheet is a flat, rectangular pan with raised edges. It is used for baking cookies, roasted vegetables, and other foods. Baking sheets can also be used to broil foods.
muffin tin

A muffin tin is a small, round pan with cups that are used to bake muffins. Muffin tins are typically made of metal or silicone, and they can be found in a variety of sizes, shapes and used to make a variety of muffins, cupcakes, and other baked goods.
Cake pan
Cake pan is a flat, round pan with a removable bottom used to bake cakes. They are used to bake cakes, cupcakes, and other baked goods.
Rolling pin
Rolling pin is a long, wooden or metal cylinder used to flatten dough for pastries, cookies, and other baked goods.
pie plate
A pie plate is a round, shallow pan with fluted edges used to bake pies. They are typically made of metal or ceramic, and they come in a variety of sizes.

A grater is a kitchen tool with sharp blades that are used to shred, grate, or zest food. Graters come in a variety of shapes and sizes, and they can be made from different materials, such as metal, plastic, or wood.

A mandoline is a kitchen tool with a long, flat blade that can be used to slice vegetables and fruits into thin, even pieces. It is a versatile tool that can be used to prepare a variety of dishes, such as salads, gratins, and stir-fries.
A blender is an appliance that uses rotating blades to mix, puree, or chop food. It is a versatile tool that can be used to prepare a variety of dishes, from smoothies to soups to sauces.
A kettle is a kitchen appliance that boils water. It is typically made of metal and has a spout for pouring water. Kettles can be used to make tea, coffee, and other hot beverages.
A toaster is a small appliance that uses radiant heat to brown bread. It has two slots for bread, a lever to lower the bread into the slots, and a control knob to adjust the brownness of the toast.
air fryer
An air fryer is a small, countertop appliance that cooks food by circulating hot air around it. This results in food that is crispy and browned on the outside, but moist and tender on the inside.
Food mill
Food mills are typically made of stainless steel or aluminum and have a bowl, a crank, and a perforated plate. It is used to create smooth purees or to remove seeds and skins from food.
stand mixer

A stand mixer is a kitchen appliance with a powerful motor that can be used to mix, knead, and whip ingredients. It is a versatile tool that can be used to prepare a variety of dishes, from cakes and cookies to bread and pasta.
hand mixer
A hand mixer is a handheld electric appliance with two beaters that are used to mix, whip, and beat ingredients.
waffle maker

A waffle maker is a kitchen appliance that cooks batter into waffles. It has two metal plates with a grid pattern on them. The batter is poured into the waffle maker and cooked until it is golden brown.
